results.title: Healthy feet, happy feet
results.brief_description: Covers the purpose and care of feet and the need for properly fitted shoes. Also shows different animals feet and their use. Suitable for lower primary level.

results.title: The French solution
results.creator_credit: Gordon Stewart, Maxine Crook and Canadian Broadcasting Corporation
results.brief_description: Emphasises the importance of daily physical education for children. Outlines the experiments conducted in France and Canada on daily activity for children and notes parents’ and children’s responses to exposure to physical education on a daily basis. Suitable for teacher/tertiary level.

results.title: Honeymation = Mezes-tangos

results.title: Introducing globes. - Rev. ed.
results.creator_credit: John Lord and BFA Educational Media
results.brief_description: Animation and live-action are combined to explain many ways a globe can be used to help develop an understanding of the earth. Introduces concepts of latitude, longitude and rotation and notes the advantages of globes over flat maps. Suitable for lower and middle secondary levels.

results.title: Khmer! Khmer!: Cambodia in conflict (D)
results.creator_credit: James G. Gerrand, ABC and Experimental Film and Television Fund
results.brief_description: Portrays the life, culture, history and politics of the Cambodians. Focuses on Norodom Sihanouk’s abdication from the throne and becoming the first Democratic Leader of Cambodia, thus destroying the old feudal system and through to social and political destruction during the Vietnam War. Narrated by Richard Oxenburgh. WARNING: Contains graphic scenes of war related deaths.
results.creator_credit_for_label: James G. Gerrand, ABC and Experimental Film and Television Fund
results.description: Portrays the life, culture, history and politics of the Cambodians. results.title: Supply and demand
results.creator_credit: Ted Abenheim, Bruce Stubblefield and Greenhouse Films
results.brief_description: Basic introductory film on the concepts of supply and demand. Defines the law of supply and the law of demand, shows how the equilibrium point between these two laws determines prices, and provides examples of these laws in real life.
